title: Solar Low-Income Tax Credit Map
subtitle: The Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) is putting tens of billions of dollars on the table to support solar development in historically disadvantaged communities. We built this tool to help you determine whether projects in your community are eligible.
description: This mapping tool combines geographic criteria used to determine eligibility for two Tax Credit programs: the Energy Communities and Low-Income Communities Bonuses. It also includes areas likely to be prioritized based on IRS guidance released in June 2023.
